title: Influence of aluminium doping on high purity quartz glass properties
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13669-13675
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01716A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Bartłomiej Adam Gaweł, Jochen Busam, Astrid Marthinsen, Gabriela Kazimiera Warden, Benny Hallam, Marisa Di Sabatino
Low ppm level Al doping of quartz glass substantially increases its viscosity at high temperatures.
